author: "Ussher, James, 1581-1656"
title: "Appendix Ignatiana. In qu continentur: 1. Ignatii epistol¾ genuin¾,  posterioris interpolatoris assumentis liber¾ ... 2. Ignatii martyrium,  Philone, Agathopode, & aliis qui passioni illius interfuerant, ... 3. Tiberiani, Plinii & Traiani Imp. de const"
